name: Scooter Rush
description:
Scooter Rush is a 3D racing game where you need to Jump over the obstacles and collect the points .

Features :
1) Unique character and Scooter design
2) Very nice scooter animations and back grounds.
3) User can post his score in FB,Twitter and challenge with his/her friends .

Enjoy the Scooter race and dont forget to send you valuable feedback .
